tool_description: Know Your Jurisdictional Assessing Officer and PAN details
name: Know Your PAN Details
title: Know Your PAN Details

api_list.name: Validate OTP and get Details
api_list.description: VAlidate OTP by entering the fields described below
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://know-your-pan-details.p.rapidapi.com/iec/guestservicesapi/validateOTP/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "know-your-pan-details.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Generate OTP
api_list.description: Enter your PAN card and Registered Mobile Number for getting the OTP on your mobile number and reqid on the api response, use that reqId for passing in validate OTP api
api_list.code:
